contents.item: If someone lied to you, and you positively know this is true, you may find delight in telling them they are the most honest person you know; continue flattering them, giving them the most wonderful compliments, including how you're so thankful to have such an honest person in such a deceptive world. But, then again, this may very well make you a liar too.
Strict and literal truthfulness was a trivial game and might even be a disagreeable neurotic affliction.
